metadata.name: This Emotional Life
metadata.summary: Exploring ways to improve our social relationships, cope with emotional issues, and become more positive individuals.
metadata.description: This 3-part series represents what television does best. It opens a window into real lives, exploring ways to improve our social relationships, cope with emotional issues, and become more positive, resilient individuals. Hosted by Daniel Gilbert, Harvard psychologist and best-selling author of Stumbling on Happiness.
metadata.keywords: PBS, This Emotional Life, psychology, emotional issues
